mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberorder(uname, pname, state, seatnum, seatarranged, charge, pay, ticketname) VALUE (#{uname},#{pname},#{state},#{seatnum},#{seatarranged},#{charge},#{pay},#{ticketname});
mapper.update: UPDATE ${table} set uname="untaken" ,status="untaken" where uname=#{uname} and pname=#{pname};
UPDATE memberorder SET state=#{state} where uname=#{uname} and pname=#{pname};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM memberorder WHERE uname=#{uname} and state=#{status} order by booktime DESC;
SELECT * FROM memberorder WHERE uname=#{uname} order by state DESC,booktime DESC;
SELECT * FROM memberorder WHERE state=#{status} order by booktime DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guestorder(pname, seatstype, seatnum, pay) VALUE (#{pname},#{stype},#{seatnum},#{pay});
